title: Accessibility Features for Enhanced Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to have accessibility features that accommodate my mobility and cognitive needs so that I can interact with the system easily and confidently manage my daily tasks.

title: Data Privacy and Security Assurance
summary: As an older adult, I want to feel confident that my personal and health information is kept private and secure so that I can use ALFRED without worrying about my data being misused.

title: Simple Installation and Setup Process
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a straightforward installation and setup process for ALFRED so that I can easily start using the system without feeling intimidated by complex technology.

title: User Interface Adaptability
summary: As an older adult, I want the interface of ALFRED to adapt to my preferences and abilities so that I can navigate the system easily and feel confident using it.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring devices so that I can easily track my health metrics and receive timely reminders for medication and alerts in case of emergencies.

title: Support for Multiple Device Platforms
summary: As an older adult, I want to use ALFRED on different devices like my tablet and smartphone so that I can manage my tasks and stay connected from anywhere in my home.

title: User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily manage my consent for data sharing so that I can feel secure about my personal and health information being used by ALFRED.

title: Personalized Integration for Health Monitoring
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring devices so that I can manage my health efficiently and receive timely reminders and alerts.

title: Feedback Mechanism for User Experience Improvement
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on my experience with ALFRED so that the system can be improved to better meet my needs and preferences.

title: User Support and Help Resources
summary: As an older adult, I want easy access to user support and help resources so that I can feel confident using ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
